results.name: Permutation of nonnegative integers: a(0) = 0, a(A255411(n)) = A153880(a(n)), a(A256450(n)) = A273670(a(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5039
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(0) = 0; for n >= 1: if A257680(n) = 0 [when n is one of the terms of A255411] then a(n) = A153880(a(A257684(n))), otherwise [when n is one of the terms of A256450], a(n) = A273670(a(A273662(n))).
As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Similar or related permutations: A255565, A273666.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 30 2016
